FuncDef: This command displays existing IKE-SA or CHILD-SA keys..
CLIs: display-key type { ike | esp } gateway name <name> dynamic-tunnel <ip-address:port>

ParaDef.Info: The IP address of the remote client. Values-<ip-address> |	ip-address 	|a.b.c.d, |ipv6-address|	x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x , ||x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d, ||			x - [0 to FFFF]H, ||			d - [0 to 255]D.
The port of the remote client. Values-0 to 65535.
The IPsec tunnel name, up to 32 characters.
